knimeNode.name: Google Sheets Connection
knimeNode.shortDescription: This node creates a connection to the Google Sheets API.

fullDescription.intro:
This node provides a connection to the Google Sheets service. There is no configuration. The Service Account mail, the P12 key, and the scopes are used to create a Google Sheets service.
Before you can access user spreadsheets, you have to share them with the service account.
For details on service accounts see: developers.google.com/identity/protocols/OAuth2ServiceAccount.

ports.inPort: The Google API connection that will be used.
ports.outPort: A connection that can be used to access Google Sheets
